title: Victim of Circumference (The Adam and Dr. Drew Show Classics)
itunes:title: Victim of Circumference (The Adam and Dr. Drew Show Classics)
description: Adam and Dr Drew open up the show talking about how Adam bartered his way onto the radio before an imposter caller brings up the flat earth movement. Later on, Adam explores his analogy about cars and the male libido before they take a call and explain the key difference between "have to" and "get to". Finally, a caller looking for help with her sister leads Adam to break down why he believes that making a person feel like a victim is the surest way to ruin their life.
